heading: Tonight
text: Mostly clear with periods of clouds. Patchy valley fog developing in the east. Mild. Lows in the 50s to low 60s. Southwest wind diminishing to light and variable overnight.

heading: Tuesday
text: Sun mixing with increasing clouds from the west, with showers developing through the St. Lawrence and NY, reaching northwest VT, and NH later in the day. Highs in the 70s to near 80. Wind becoming southwest near 10 mph, occasionally gusting to 15 mph, with the highest gusts west of the Green Mountains.

heading: Tuesday Night
text: Widespread rain showers, chance of localized downpours. Lows near 50 in the northeast, increasing to the low to mid 50s in the west and south.
